bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter from J.W. Crane to Philip Showalter Hench, January 8, 1941

div1.p: Crane congratulates Hench on his article, "The Conquerors of Yellow Fever." He would like to secure a copy of Dean Cornwell's painting to add it to his collection dealing with Medical History.

div1.head: Letter from J.W. Crane to Philip Showalter Hench, January 8, 1941
div1.opener:
OFFICE OF ALUMNI DIRECTOR
ROOM 213, MEDICAL SCHOOL
ROOM 102, COLLEGE OF ARTS
THE UNIVERSITY OF WESTERN ONTARIO
LONDON, CANADA
January 5th, 1941
Acknowledged, 1-13-41
Dr. P.S. Hench
102-2nd Ave. S.W.
Rochester, Minn.
My dear Dr. Hench:
div1.p:
I enjoyed very much your article on the “Conquerors
of Yellow Fever” in the last issue of the Proceedings. I was
very much interested, too, in the reproduction of Dean Cornwell's
painting and I was wondering whether I could secure a copy from
the Wyeth Co. I certainly would like to add it to my collection
of steel engravings, lithos, etc. dealing with Medical History.
Wishing you the Compliments of the Season,
div1.closer:
Yours very truly, J. W. Crane
Alumni Director JWC/MW
